sentence.Network_en: Anthropocentrism and non - anthropocentrism are two groups of studying the relationship between human being and nature.

sentence.Network_en: There exists a controversy between anthropocentrism and counter - anthropocentrism on the ecological environment problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 在生态环境问题上存在着人类中心主义和 反 人类中心主义的争论,双方都有各自的道理.

anthropocentric adj ., 以人类为中心的.

anthropocentric economic development view is based on human appreciation , advocating economic humanism and all around human happiness with human being as purpose .人本经济发展观以人类增值为本，主张经济人类主义和全面的人类幸福，将人类当作目的。
